titles.title: 058 - Hark, the Vesper Hymn Is Stealing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hark! the vesper hymn is stealing
Oâ€™er the waters soft and clear;
Jubilate, Jubilate, Jubilate,
Amen.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nearer yet, and nearer pealing,
Soft it breaks upon the ear.
Jubilate, Jubilate, Jubilate,
Amen.
